tooltip.title: Recommendations for choosing a service:
list: If you are only interested in the price — basic evaluation is sufficient.
For selling, insurance, or authenticity verification — a detailed evaluation and authenticity certification are suitable.
tooltip.info: This will not only provide you with the necessary information but also allow you to use your budget most effectively.

steps.title: Get a professional evaluation of your item.

list.title: 1. Familiarize yourself with the types of evaluation.
list.text: Choose the service that best suits your needs: basic evaluation or preparation of an authenticity certificate.

list.title: 2. Fill out a short form
list.text: Add known information about your lot and upload high-quality photos that clearly show the item from different angles.

list.title: 3. Submit your application.
list.text: After submission, our experts will start processing your request.

list.title: 4. Wait for a response
list.text: You will receive preliminary information about the item's value and the cost of the chosen service.

list.title: 5. Confirm the request.
list.text: Pay for the service and receive a comprehensive evaluation.

options.title: Choose the necessary evaluation option for your item:

what.label: What it is:
description: A brief consultation or basic evaluation providing a general understanding of the item. You will learn its approximate value and context: history, approximate age, style, or significance.
IMPORTANT! The evaluation is based on visual characteristics; be sure to provide high-quality photos.

what.label: What it is:
description: A professional conclusion confirming the item's originality. Signed by an expert and can be used for sales, museum placement, auctions, and other platforms.
IMPORTANT! Expertise always involves physical contact with the item, so the item must be provided for evaluation to achieve objective results.
The item can be sent for expertise using postal services or in person. Expertise takes from 10 days to 1 month.

price.label: Average cost:
description: Basic expertise: 2000 UAH + 2% of the estimated value.
Extended: 10,000 UAH (depending on the complexity of the research).

owner.label: What the lot owner receives:
description: Confirmation recognized by the professional community.
